content:
Welcome to #ncts-connectathon.

Description: Chat relating to connectathon events for the Australian National Clinical Terminology Service.
We've set this channel up to enable people to ask questions and collaborate leading up to and during the upcoming NCTS Connectathon event in Brisbane on April 17.
See http://bit.ly/austerm201804 to register participation, servers, clients, look for tasks, and record your progress
